detailed_info.POPULATION: Westwood's population is 1,393 people. Since 2020, it has had a population growth of 54.2%.
detailed_info.TRANSPORTATION: Average Commute time is 20.9 minutes. The National Average is 26.4 minutes
detailed_info.REAL ESTATE: The median home cost in Westwood is $430,700. Home appreciation the last 10 years has been 3.9%
detailed_info.SCHOOLS: Westwood public schools spend $6,441 per student. The average school expenditure in the U.S. is $12,383. There are about 18 students per teacher in Westwood

detailed_info.ECONOMY: The unemployment rate in New Brunswick is 6.6% (U.S. avg. is 6.0%). Recent job growth is Negative. New Brunswick jobs have decreased by 0.1%
detailed_info.COST OF LIVING: Compared to the rest of the country, New Brunswick's cost of living is 14.8% higher than the U.S. average
